testcase.classname: As a provider I want to be able to access blogs via API connection.
testcase.name: Verify that a GET request to /api/blogs with an invalid API key returns status code 401 and response_message
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "invalid" token.............passed * The api user sets "api/blogs" path parameters.............................passed * The api user sends a GET request, saves the returned response, and verifies that the status code is '401' with the reason phrase Unauthorized..passed
